origin.spookyorigins.headlesshorseman.de: He lost his head, but he got a horse and an axe!
origin.spookyorigins.scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
origin.spookyorigins.scarecrow.descripti: They can't find crows to scare often, so they scare chickens instead.
origin.spookyorigins.stoneangel.name: Stone Angel
origin.spookyorigins.stoneangel.descript: Related to the Weeping Angels ... somehow.
